TEXT.S: siwkay ni Cedric Bozeman unu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u mikilac zikuzay mimaliay/adidi'ay ayaway mimaliay. tatama ciniza, Amilika cidekay a tademaw, nalecuhan i 3 a bulad 7 a demiad, 1983 a mihca, Cedric Bozeman, miunduay. lumeniay ku banges ciniza, singisnigs ciniza.
